headings.usage: Main titles, Section headers, Dish names

accents.usage: Special offers, 'Pet Friendly' tags, Handwritten notes

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous padding (py-16, py-24) to create breathing room.
layout_strategy.mobile: Stack vertically, use horizontal scroll for categories.

header.style: Sticky, Glassmorphism (Blur 12px), Cream background with 80% opacity.

hero.style: Full-screen immersive image with slow zoom effect.

menu.style: Filterable Grid. Cards with rounded corners (rounded-xl), subtle shadow, image on top.

reservations.style: Clean Shadcn Form embedded in a 'Paper' textured container.

footer.style: Dark Olive background (#2F3E1B), Light Cream text.

assets.icons: Lucide React (Leaf, Utensils, Calendar, MapPin, Phone, Dog)

motion.hover: Scale 1.02 on cards, Button fill effect.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on images has a dark overlay or shadow.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: Proper labels for all form inputs and buttons.

tech_stack.frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Shadcn UI

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the menu categories.
Ensure the 'Book Now' button is always visible (Sticky Header).
Use the 'Olive Green' color for primary actions and branding.
Create a 'Pet Friendly' banner with a cute icon and the 'Caveat' font.
Mock the Google Maps iframe with a placeholder if no API key is available, but style it nicely.
Ensure the Admin Panel is protected (mock login if needed) and allows CRUD on Menu items.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
